Macon.Macon Coliseum: The Macon Centreplex is a multi-purpose arena and in Macon, Georgia, United States. It was home to the Macon Whoopee (ECHL), Macon Whoopee (CHL) and Macon Trax ice hockey teams and also the Macon Knights arena football team until 2006. It is home to the Macon Mayhem, a minor-league hockey team in the Southern Professional Hockey League.
